content: Write a rhyming poem containing at least 10 lines.

In a meadow where the wildflowers bloom,  
Underneath the sky, a vast, endless room,  
The gentle breeze whispers secrets untold,  
Stories of wonders, both new and old.  

The sun dips low, painting skies in gold,  
While shadows dance, tales of night unfold.  
A brook sings softly, its melody clear,  
Carrying whispers for those who can hear.  

Stars begin to twinkle, a celestial show,  
Guiding the night with their gentle glow.  
In this serene world, dreams take flight,  
Wrapped in the calm embrace of night.
